Row.Text: Happy cities receive an additional +5% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Happy cities generate +1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point, +1 [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist point and +1 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point per Theater. Ecstatic cities double all these amounts.
Can declare a War of Protectorate after gaining the Military Tradition Civic. +100% [ICON_Culture] Culture if they have liberated a city in the past 10 turns.
Colombia unique Industrial era heavy cavalry unit. +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength when fighting on flat ground. Lower maintenance cost.

A building unique to Gran Colombia. Replaces the Arena.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture. These bonus extends to each city center within 6 tiles, applies once to a city, and multiple copies of this building within 6 tiles of a city center do not provide additional bonuses.[NEWLINE]Add +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture when unlock the Gun Powder technology. This bonus only applies to cities that have built this building.
Gran Colombia unique building: Tejo Arena
